snippet.title: M E C H A N I S M - Release date announcement
snippet.description:
This is the final pre-release trailer for Mechanism - an adventure game about a lonely robot. Relase date: July 19th of this summer!
M E C H A N I S M on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/645290/Mechanism/
